src.tdp.classic_algorithms_tdp module

class src.tdp.classic_algorithms_tdp.COPRA(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: COPRABASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The Common Pulse Retrieval Algorithm (COPRA) for FROG. Inherits from COPRABASE and RetrievePulsesTDP.

get_Z_gradient_individual(signal_t, signal_t_new, population, tau_arr, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error gradient for an individual.

get_Z_newton_direction(grad, signal_t, signal_t_new, tau_arr, population, local_or_global_state, measurement_info, descent_info, full_or_diagonal, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error newton direction for a population.

update_individual(individual, gamma, descent_direction, measurement_info, descent_info, pulse_or_gate)

Updates an individual based on a descent direction and a step size.

Bases: GeneralizedProjectionBASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The Generalized Projection Algorithm for FROG. Inherits from GeneralizedProjectionBASE and RetrievePulsesTDP.

calculate_Z_gradient_individual(signal_t, signal_t_new, population, tau_arr, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error gradient for an individual.

calculate_Z_newton_direction(grad, signal_t_new, signal_t, tau_arr, descent_state, measurement_info, descent_info, full_or_diagonal, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error newton direction for a population.

update_individual(individual, gamma, descent_direction, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Updates an individual based on a descent_direction and step size.

class src.tdp.classic_algorithms_tdp.PtychographicIterativeEngine(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, pie_method='rPIE', cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: RetrievePulsesTDP, PtychographicIterativeEngine

The Ptychographic Iterative Engine (PIE) for FROG. Inherits from RetrievePulsesTDP and PtychgraphicIterativeEngineFROG.

pie_method

None or str, specifies the PIE variant. Can be one of None, PIE, ePIE, rPIE.

src.tdp.general_algorithms_tdp module

class src.tdp.general_algorithms_tdp.AutoDiff(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: AutoDiffBASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The Optimistix package utilized for pulse reconstruction from TDP. Inherits from AutoDiffBASE and RetrievePulsesTDP.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)
make_pulse_from_individual(individual, measurement_info, descent_info, pulse_or_gate)

Evaluates a pulse/gate for an individual.

class src.tdp.general_algorithms_tdp.DifferentialEvolution(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: DifferentialEvolutionBASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The Differential Evolution Algorithm applied to TDP. Inherits from DifferentialEvolutionBASE and RetrievePulsesTDP.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Calls get_pulses_t_from_population()

Bases: EvosaxBASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The Evosax package utilized for pulse reconstruction from TDP. Inherits from EvosaxBASE and RetrievePulsesTDP.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Calls get_pulses_t_from_population()

class src.tdp.general_algorithms_tdp.LSF(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: LSFBASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The LSF Algorithm applied to TDP. Inherits from LSFBASE and RetrievePulsesTDP.

convert_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Converts any population into a discretized one.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Returns the pulse and gate population. Does not need to call get_pulses_t_from_population() since LSF works with discetized fields only.
